name: Pass Me The Ball
content: You don't know what to do with it
This game is mental man I play aloud
And walk away just to hush the crowd
You trying to touch sit down
All my coins in the bank and I'm
You already know what to do
Leave the ball with delayed palm prints
Homie like I told you this is
You gotta walk before you crawl
This is detroit basketball homie hey yo
